coefficients.description: Array of arrays with weights/coefficients from the linear or non-linear fit

items.description: array of weights/coefficients of the function for each target in property vector

intercept.description: list of intercepts (shift) from the linear or non-linear fit of data points

items.description: intercept corresponding to the fit for each target in property vector

features.description: Array of arrays with subset of features used in linear or non-linear fit

items.description: array of features for each target in property vector

scores.description: Array of arrays with pvalues of features used in linear or non-linear fit, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/P-value

items.description: array of pvalues of features for predicting each target in property vector

scaler.description: feature scaling parameters from linear/non-linear fit

dataFrame.description: materials data used to train/fit ml method
